statements: SELECT * FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage
SELECT id, pesticide_name, usage_amount FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE drone_id = 3
SELECT pesticide_name, herbicide_name FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE herbicide_name = 'Roundup'
SELECT id, usage_date FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE usage_amount > 50 ORDER BY usage_date DESC, pesticide_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, pesticide_name, herbicide_name FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE drone_id = 3 AND usage_amount < 100 ORDER BY usage_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE herbicide_name LIKE '%weed%' AND pesticide_name LIKE '%insect%'
SELECT MAX(usage_amount) AS max_usage FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage
SELECT DISTINCT pesticide_name, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage GROUP BY pesticide_name HAVING total_usage > 5 ORDER BY total_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage
SELECT * FROM herbicide_usage WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT name, brand FROM pesticide_usage ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT * FROM herbicide_usage WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT pid, name, quantity FROM pesticide_usage
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT name, quantity FROM herbicide_usage WHERE brand = 'Roundup' ORDER BY hid ASC
SELECT name, brand, quantity FROM pesticide_usage WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM herbicide_usage WHERE quantity < 10 AND brand = 'WeedMaster' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT pid, name, brand, quantity, application_date FROM pesticide_usage WHERE pid IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM pesticide_recommendations;
SELECT pesticide_name, recommended_usage FROM pesticide_recommendations WHERE crop_type='Corn';
SELECT * FROM herbicide_recommendations WHERE herbicide_id = 3;
SELECT drone_id, location, recommendation_id FROM drone_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM pesticide_recommendations;
SELECT pesticide_name, recommended_usage FROM pesticide_recommendations WHERE crop_type='Fruits';
SELECT drone_id, location FROM drone_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM herbicide_recommendations WHERE herbicide_id < 5;
SELECT COUNT(herbicide_id) AS total_herbicides FROM herbicide_recommendations;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_recommendations WHERE recommended_usage LIKE '%spray%'
SELECT * FROM Pesticides;
SELECT Name, Type FROM Herbicides WHERE Usage > 100;
SELECT Name, Model FROM Drones ORDER BY Range DESC;
SELECT Name, Type, Usage FROM Pesticides WHERE Usage < 50;

SELECT Recommendations.RecommendationDate, Drones.Name, Pesticides.Name FROM Recommendations JOIN Drones ON Recommendations.DroneID = Drones.ID JOIN Pesticides ON Recommendations.PesticideID = Pesticides.ID;
SELECT * FROM Pesticides WHERE Usage > 50 ORDER BY Name DESC;
SELECT Name, Type FROM Herbicides WHERE Type = 'Spray' ORDER BY ID;
SELECT Name, Model, Range FROM Drones WHERE Range > 500 ORDER BY Model;
SELECT Name AS PesticideName, Type AS PesticideType FROM Pesticides WHERE Usage < 30 ORDER BY Usage DESC;

SELECT r.ID AS RecommendationID, d.Name AS DroneName, p.Name AS PesticideName, h.Name AS HerbicideName FROM Recommendations r JOIN Drones d ON r.DroneID = d.ID JOIN Pesticides p ON r.PesticideID = p.ID JOIN Herbicides h ON r.HerbicideID = h.ID;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage;
SELECT pesticide_name, quantity_used, usage_date FROM pesticide_usage WHERE quantity_used > 100;
SELECT pest_name, threat_level FROM pests ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM fields WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT pesticide_name, usage_date, drone_recommendation_id FROM pesticide_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT herbicide_name, quantity_used FROM herbicide_usage WHERE quantity_used > 100 ORDER BY quantity_used ASC;

SELECT p.pest_name, f.field_name, d.recommendation_date FROM pests p JOIN drone_recommendations d ON p.id = d.pest_type JOIN fields f ON d.field_id = f.id WHERE d.rating >= 4 ORDER BY d.recommendation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT field_name, crop_type FROM fields WHERE field_size > 100 ORDER BY field_name;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT pesticide_name) AS unique_pesticides, COUNT(id) AS total_usages FROM pesticide_usage;
